main event: A bright light with erratic movement was observed for 15 minutes at high altitude near Vichy, France.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 15 minutes on June 15, 1962., The object appeared bright and clear, disappearing and reappearing intermittently., The object made no sound during the observation., The object was observed at a course of 015 degrees., The conclusions of the sighting were classified as unknown.
sighted object: a bright light in the sky
witness description: An observer who reported witnessing the event.
